title: Chapter 1422 - Manifesting Mortality!
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1422 - Manifesting Mortality!

The power of the Contract of the Gods was invisible and intangible, but it really did exist, and it was calamitous, terrifying, and destructive.

Yet, when it surged into Su Yi’s body, the dormant Sword of the Nine Hells was instantly startled into action!

Boom!

A mysterious, inscrutable power burst from the Sword of the Nine Hells, like a massive net, seizing the silent, invisible power of the Contract of the Gods. 

The contract’s power struggled violently against the Sword of the Nine Hells. Su Yi’s body had become a battleground.

But in the end, it couldn’t withstand the power of the Sword of the Nine Hells, which refined it completely.

Su Yi watched coldly from beginning to end. Over the past month, he’d experienced similarly strange tribulations on numerous occasions.

He’d long since known that, with the Sword of the Nine Hells there to protect him, the Contract of the Guards was no threat. Even so, every time he saw this strange, unsettling power, Su Yi’s heart filled with indescribable dread!

The Contract of the Gods was far too terrifying. It was far beyond the bounds of Su Yi’s prior understanding.

According to his sixth incarnation, the Contract of the Gods was a power...
